name: 吳牧恩
objective:
本課程介紹如何將金融操作的方式，以明確的演算法去定義、描述與執行。課程內容伴隨使用R語言進行 ，並探討如何運用時下最流行的機器學習技術於金融交易? 課程後半段邀請業師教學程式交易軟體使用，及期末論文與成果報告

This course introduces how to define, describe, and execute financial trading in a clear algorithm. The course content is accompanied by the use of the R language and explores how to use the most popular machine learning techniques for financial trading.
In the second half of the course, the lecturers are invited to teach the program trading software. Students have to present the final projects and reports.
